document_data.caption: A map showing the River Eltar in central Thay.
document_data.name: River Eltar
document_data.mainbody: The '''River Eltar''' was a small body of water located in the nation of [[Thay]] in the [[Unapproachable East]].{{Cite interactive atlas|B1dNWIc}}
document_data.Geography: The River Eltar originated high on the [[Thaymount]] in central Thay. It flowed east down the mountain for a short distance before connecting with the southwest corner of [[Lake Thaylambar]].
document_data.Notable Locations: [[Eltabbar]] was located on the south side of the river near Lake Thaylambar.
